citations.narrative:
In August, a grey seal “Medusa” was hauled out of the water for a training session and a rock from the back wall of her
primary enclosure fell on her, breaking a bone and causing her to lose a nail on her right front flipper. The enclosure is
comprised of a pool, haul out area and landscape rocks stacked in a retaining wall pattern. On inspection, the inspector
could easily move and shift loose rocks around the wall which have a potential to come off the wall and cause injury to the
seals in the exhibit. The facility must ensure the enclosure is maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by: April 12, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.101(a)(1)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
In August, a grey seal “Medusa” was hauled out of the water for a training session and a rock from the back wall of her 
primary enclosure fell on her, breaking a bone and causing her to lose a nail on her right front flipper. The enclosure is 
comprised of a pool, haul out area and landscape rocks stacked in a retaining wall pattern. On inspection, the inspector 
could easily move and shift loose rocks around the wall which have a potential to come off the wall and cause injury to the 
seals in the exhibit. The facility must ensure the enclosure is maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.  
 
Correct by: April 12, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
